metadata.synopsis: Eagerly awaiting the next steps from their leader Wulbren. Ready to do whatever he directs. If Wulbren or Nimble are dead, he'll be noticably more downbeat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. run oe SCE_SetupGnomes_SetFlags2. Runoe SCE_SetupGnomes_AllGnomes-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_NoBarcus-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadN-or-oe SCE_SetupGnomes_DeadWulbren3. Run oe SCE_SetupDebrief4. Go to Act 2 Coordinates X:-166 Y:-170 (Moonrise Bazaar)5. Engage one of the gnomes in dialogue

0.speaker: Nickels
0.text: It'll take time, but this tower's stone will heal.

1.speaker: Nickels
1.context: NodeContext: Mourning the death of a friend

2.speaker: Nickels
2.text: Where do we go now? Where's home?
2.context: NodeContext: reflecting on the death of a leader
